frames.text:
Lumen is a sustainability-focused lifestyle startup that creates eco-friendly home products designed for urban millennials. Their product range includes reusable kitchenware, minimal home goods, and refillable cleaning supplies.

Scope: Develop a complete brand identity system, including:

Logo redesign

Typography & color system

Brand guidelines

Applications across packaging, website, and social media

Digital style guide for product and web consistency
